articles.title: Apple to Revamp Siri as a Built-In iPhone, Mac Chatbot to Fend Off OpenAI - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Apple Inc. plans to revamp Siri later this year by turning the digital assistant into the company’s first artificial intelligence chatbot, thrusting the iPhone maker into a generative AI race dominated by OpenAI and Google.

articles.title: Ubisoft cancels Prince of Persia remake as part of major reorganization - The Verge
articles.description: Ubisoft is announcing a major reorganization and canceling games, including the remake of Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. The company will focus on big open worlds and live service games.
